list.title: State - Origin
list.introduction: When not touching on the control panel, the control panel showing as a circle. It can be sticked around four corners of the device.

list.title: State - Hold
list.introduction: When user touch the control panel the blob shape control panel showing up, with menu button and alt button. User can drag and move around the blob control panel and switch to different control states.

list.title: State - Menu
list.introduction: When user move the finger to menu button, the menu button getting bigger and the main button getting smaller, control mode trigger to menu mode. Under menu mode, when user tap object on the canvas, a contextual menu bar will show up.

list.title: State - Alt
list.introduction: When user move the finger to alt tool button, the alt tool button getting bigger and the main button getting smaller, control mode trigger to alt tool mode. Under alt tool mode, the alternative tool bar showing up.

list.title: Blob Effect Simulated with Photoshop
list.introduction: Link to Photoshop file from dropbox. You can play with it and apply different type of shapes and gradient effects.
